dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool finds stream network segments which fall outside of then Valley Bottom polygon. You can then edit the valley bottom to correct this.

tool.name: OutsideValleyBottomTool

param.name: InputStreamNetwork
param.dialogReference: The feature class you are cleaning. This should be a projected stream network.

param.name: InputVBPolygon
param.dialogReference: The valley bottom polygon you have created and are editing.

param.name: Output Workspace
param.dialogReference: The folder or geodatabase where you want the Output File to be created.

param.name: ScratchWorkspace
param.dialogReference: The folder or geodatabase where you want the working files to be created.

param.name: strOutputWorkspace
param.dialogReference: The folder or geodatabase where you want the working files to be created.

param.name: OutputStreamNetwork
param.dialogReference:
The features which fall outside of the Valley Bottom polygon.

This dataset contains a field called "InVB" which contains either a "Yes" or a blank. Segments with blanks fall outside of the Valley Bottom and are selected in a final output file. Use these features to find areas which need to be edited in the Valley Bottom polygon.

tool.summary: This tool finds stream network segments which fall outside of then Valley Bottom polygon. You can then edit the valley bottom to correct this.
